survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
I am ready
awesome! right, so i'm at the starting point
Hay una ramita a mi izquierda que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿Cómo debo empezar?
Follow to that tiger island
perfecto! now i'm on the tiger's island
is the next move towards the butterfly island at the southeast or do we head southwest to the large island with a parrot?
towards the parrot
roger that, friend! now i'm on the island with the parrot, there's an elephant to the left
¿Debería charlar con este loro o acercarme al elefante?
Go towards the frog, cross the rocks
alrighty, crossed the rocks, now chillin' with the frog
there's a crocodile to my left though, should i keep away?
No, use the crocodile to gross towards the elephant
okay, over the crocodile, back to the elephant zone
¡Frío! ¿ahora que?
Ve hacia la girafa
sure thing, hanging out with the giraffe now
i see a snake southeast, should i head there?
Si
¡lo entendiste! pasando el rato con una serpiente resbaladiza ahora
Keep going, the gold is in front of you
gotcha, moving towards the treasure! aaand
jackpot! *finished*

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
I am ready
awesome! let's begin
muévete unos pasos hacia tu izquierda, debajo del banco de madera que ves. A continuación, debes cruzar ese sendero hacia el puesto de floristería.
I have reached the florist. What do I do now?
now, here's a twist
take a sharp 180 and go back the way you came, crossing the path again towards where the white dog is sitting
I am back towards the white dog
perfecto! now, journey south. cross that branch and keep going south
conocerás a otro perro blanco relajándose junto a un picnic.
Estoy con el perro blanco. Now what?
now very carefully, walk over the picnic mat without disturbing the berries
then, head west
Do I cross the log?
si amigo! cross the log north
Encontrarás otro río allí.
I am by the bridge. Do I cross?
no, don't touch that river
instead, go right around that bush until you reach the florist stand again
Estoy con el florist
excelente! now, take a left and head below the stand
continúa hasta que veas un puente con un par de ciclistas
I am with the cyclist
keep going past them, towards the west side of the bridge
I have crossed the bridge
brilliant! now look out for a couple of oldies enjoying their newspaper on a bench
I see the viejitos
¡bien! Ahora camina unos pasos hacia el sur, en el espacio entre el banco y otra rama de madera.
I am there
estupendo! now there should be a green bush near the end of that wooden branch
head east but remain between the branch and the bush
I am there. I see Bambi
¡qué bien! and there you have it, we've made it to our final destination
Sé amigable y saluda a Bambi de mi parte, ¿quieres?
I will do
thanks for playing, buddy
you were great!
Thank you
¡de nada! en cualquier momento amigo
Ok, destination reached
great job! you navigated this like a champ
Gracias
you're welcome! can't wait until our next adventure

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Si, vamos
genial! entonces, estoy comenzando en una carpa en el norte del mapa
Where am I headed now?
head south towards the dog, then take a left towards the fire
got it, i'm by the fire now
Veo un hongo rojo a mi derecha. ¿Cuál es mi próximo paso?
Head towards the mushroom, then south towards the blue car. Keep going south until you reach the telescope
gracias, he encontrado el coche azul y sigo caminando hacia el sur hasta el telescopio
and then?
Go derecha until you see a cabin
yeah, i got it. the rocks around the house are a cool detail
Muy bien, hemos llegado a la casa. *finalizado*. ¡eso fue divertido!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
I am ready, compadre
great! let's dive in. first, head southwest under that first palm tree, then make a swift right by the second tree
totalmente a la izquierda antes del árbol no. 3 y sigue hacia el sur
I am heading south
nice! now look for a brown puppy
walk a bit to its left, then veer left and then right to keep going south. got it?
I am near a rock
perfect, mate! now, squeeze between that big rock on your left and the smaller one on your right
dirígete directamente al agua que tienes delante. ¡moja tus dedos de los pies!
Ah! me moje mis deditos!
espero que esté fresco! ahora mira ese cangrejo rojo, gira a la derecha y sigue la roca grande hacia el oeste
Me va a comer el tiburon!
ha, don't sweat it! just make a sharp turn right before you get to our friendly shark
I went to the right of the shark
awesome! now head back to the land between that medium rock and the funky colored ball
ir al norte
I am at the ball
good on ya, mate! now, veer a bit to your left and move northwest, you should be between a red tent and a speaker
I am there
ace! now, circle around that tent like you’re dancing around a bonfire!
Done
well done, buddy! now, head south towards the sea, but don't quite hit the water
Cuando llegues a la orilla, gira a la derecha y pasa por debajo del kayak rojo. ¿suena bien?

Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think they are being humble and relatable.
